timeline.bodyText:
From my perspective, new Object[] {} makes sense when you want to differentiate between args and the params.
Here in particular, I feel it's harder to reason about.
I don't have a massive opinion on this, but borderline "no", it feels less readable to me
timeline.author: david-allison-1

timeline.message: NF: avoid new Object[] in queries
